text: O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ uan nguibamɨn ikɨ, uan ingangarir gumazamizibar akaba baragh, egh deraghvɨra men kotiam akɨrigh. Egh nɨ mɨzazim isɨ gumazir osɨmtɨzim gamizim gasɨ, egh osɨmtɨzir kuramɨn uam a ikaragh. Egh nɨ osɨmtɨziba puvatɨzir gumazim deraghvɨra a damightɨ, gumaziba bizir kamɨn ganigh fogh suam an arazir kuram gamizir puvatɨ.
